data.message: need help facebook... I have recieved and inbox message claiming to be facebook security they said there was a problem with my account and needed me to verified my email address or be permamently blocked and when i tried to copy it to send to you to see if you did send it it now ssays the message has been temporarily removed account requires verification... please if this was you please let me know what is happening.. tysm I love my facebook account

replies.message: Thanks for checking in with us, Lorrie. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. Be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. When you see stuff like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2n095NQ. -Krista

Hi Richard. We hear your frustration. If your girlfriend thinks she may have been blocked by mistake, she can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2nU7FTB. -Joe
